articles.description: Excess niacin fuels inflammation, cardiovascular disease through newly discovered pathway. Cleveland Clinic researchers have identified a new pathway that contributes to cardiovascular disease associated with high levels of niacin, a common B vitamin previous…
articles.content: A team from the Cleveland Clinic has identified a new contributor to cardiovascular disease: 4PY, a byproduct of excess niacin (vitamin B-3). Their research shows that high levels of 4PY are linked t… [+5577 chars]
